case.name: Revy Grope
case.description: Revy inspects Jura's breasts for fake-ness herself by groping them.

trigger.state: Eeek! W-what are you doing? (You just told me to check 'em.)
Eep! I-I wasn't serious! S-stop it! (What, are my hands rougher than your girlfriend's?)
Aaack! S-someone help! The crazy gunslinger's going to kill me! (Christ, shut up already.)
W-what are you--eek! R-Revy! I just met you! I'm taken! (...Huh. They're pretty soft.)
Wha--R-Revy! I was just teasing! Cut it out! Eek! (Like you don't get your little fucktoy girlfriend to do this.)
R-Revy! No, please, I don't want to fight! Don't ruin my face! (What, you thought I was kidding?)

case.name: Natsuki Motorboat
case.description: Jura smushes Natsuki between her breasts.

trigger.state: It's time you learned to love the female body, darling! You can stay here as long as you like...
Now you stay between these until you learn to be nicer! Big, healthy breasts are something we can all enjoy!
Heeheehee! You're such a little squirt! What would you do for a chest like this, hm?
Yoink! Heeheehee, imagine if Barnette saw me doing this! Enjoy the view, darling!
Yah! Now isn't this the most plush, pillowy, gorgeous body you've ever felt? Relish it...
There's only one way you're going to warm up to me! How's this 20-year-old body feel, hm?
You are just so adorably tiny! I want to bring you back to the ship and sandwich you with Barnette!

case.name: Amalia Flower Gift
case.description: Amalia gives Jura some flowers for not complaining about her covering herself.

trigger.state: Hm? Omigosh, Amalia, thank you so much! You're such a sweet little green bean!
Are you serious, Amalia? Oh! Omigosh! They're so pretty! I don't see enough flowers!
Ooh, Amalia, thank you! I'm sorry if I called you haughty! Flowers are so romantic!
Omigosh! Omigosh, thank you, honey! You're sweet for a princess--I need to give these to Barnette!
Ooh! This is going right in my hair! Thank you, Miss Princess, and tell your kingdom Mejare says hi!

case.name: Meia Dual Masturbation
case.description: Jura takes it upon herself to help with Meia's masturbation.

markers.marker: Jura acknowledges that the game has come down to her and one other player.
Jura turns around to display her butt, and how her hair covers most of it.
Jura mentions Famas and/or Omas, the women who splice their eggs together on planet Mejare to have children.
Jura greets the female player the first time she strips.
Jura relaxes for a moment after masturbating.
"My, aren't you an arrogant little thing? Or perhaps that's just the face you put on when the whip comes out."
Jura comments that Zone shouldn't be having trouble telling her and Jin apart.
Jura thinks Korra's reluctance to talk about her girlfriend is silly when she's willing to get naked in public.
Jura greets the male player the first time he strips.
Jura is dumbfounded by Meia's apparent streetfighting experience.
Jura takes it upon herself to make Meia remember the woman's touch.
Jura asks Nagisa if Earth women allow men to shove their "tubes" into them regularly.
Jura muses about Natsuki telling her to write Barnette a poem.
Jura smushes Natsuki between her breasts.
Jura tells Nayru that Meia tends to relax the more naked she is.
Jura misinterprets an Earth nation as an entire planet.
Jura teases Raven over trying to remain focused around her.
Revy takes it upon herself to determine whether Jura's breasts are real.
Jura notices Revy is putting her guns down.
Jura asks the table how to seduce men--or women if there's five women playing.
Jura thinks Meia and Sei's daughters would be cute.
Jura teases that she isn't wearing any underwear...even though she is.
